ai-patthana21.18:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.18:1.1_0: or causes and reasons to give rise to the result.
ai-patthana21.18:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.18:2.1_0: or causes and reasons that the result of things do not arise to because of an incomplete assembly.
ai-patthana21.18:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.18:3.1_0: or in (the nature of a) thing, there is no cause or condition for the sake of embracing of knowledge, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.18:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.18:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
